notes: The net travels at a speed of 900.
Roots the caster upon cast, and the target upon projectile impact.

The root prevents caster and the target from moving and casting certain mobility spells. Provides True Sight over the caster and the target, but only when they were not invisible or within a fade time upon hit.
abilities.description: Ensnares the target enemy and yourself for 1.75 seconds.

attrs: Bonus +6 Strength +6 Agility +6 Intelligence +2 Mana regeneration
